title: 求大和号的存档
author: ryanminecraft
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ryanminecraft 于 2012-8-25 01:47 编辑 

请问有哪位神人有大和号的存档？悬赏90金币！！！

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
放进了之前的Scharnhorst里面
